sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { getLocal } from '../../helpers/auth' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from '../login/Login' import jwtDecode from 'jwt-decode' import axios from 'axios' import { baseUrl } from '../../api/api' function UserProfile() { const history = useNavigate() const response = getLocal(); async function getUser(){ user = await axios.get(`${baseUrl}user-detail/${jwtDecode(response).user_id}/`) console.log(user); } getUser() useEffect(()=>{ if (!response) { history('/') } },[]) return (
{user?.username}
Information
Email

{user?.email}

Phone

123 456 789

) } export default UserProfile
